p: In this study, we adapted HIV TRAnsmission Cluster Engine (HIV-TRACE), a recently developed tool for rapid and automated characterization of transmission networks from large sets of HIV-1 genetic sequences [ 8], and used HIV-1 sequence data from HIV-positive subjects diagnosed in Guangzhou city between 2008 and 2015, to locate nondisclosed MSM in HIV-1 transmission network and to explore their characteristics and potential role in HIV-1 epidemics.
